secretAccessKey.label: Secret Access Key
secretAccessKey.help: Matching Secret Access key for AWS Access Key ID.

region.label: Region
region.help: Region where the Dynamo DB Table is location i.e. (us-west-2).

fields.label: Fields
fields.help: (Optional) Data will be inserted as is if this is blank. List of the Table Fields/Columns. Input for this field is in JSON format {"(field_name)" : {"source_field" : "value"}}. field_name will be the name of the column in the MySQL Table, source_field (required) value will be the name of the field in the JSON Data passed to the plugin.
